favorites.title: Forrest Gump
favorites.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more, seen through the eyes of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

favorites.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
favorites.plot: A meek Hobbit and his companions set out to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth.

favorites.title: Interstellar
favorites.plot: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

favorites.title: Forrest Gump
favorites.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more, seen through the eyes of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

favorites.title: Inception
favorites.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

favorites.title: The Green Mile
favorites.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, who has a mysterious gift.

favorites.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, who has a mysterious gift.

favorites.title: The Departed
favorites.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

favorites.title: Django Unchained
favorites.plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more, seen through the eyes of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.plot: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much bigger.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.plot: A former Roman general sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.plot: In German-occupied Poland during WWII, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.plot: A meek Hobbit and his companions set out to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.plot: A young FBI agent seeks the help of a manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.plot: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of Jewish soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker to his fall involving crime and corruption.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory where he is mentored by a ruthless instructor.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife and his involvement with the mob's violent partners.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.plot: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a reality TV show.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.plot: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.

movies.title: American Beauty
movies.plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.plot: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.title: The Sixth Sense
movies.plot: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

movies.title: Memento
movies.plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from tyranny.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.plot: A sole survivor tells the twisted events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat.
